insomnia.name: import-graphql-request-collection
insomnia.description: Gets the GraphQL schema from a URL and creates a request collection for all possible queries and mutations

scripts.install-on-mac: npm install && npm run build && mkdir -p "~/Library/Application\ Support/Insomnia/plugins/" && cp -r ./ "~/Library/Application\ Support/Insomnia/plugins/insomnia-plugin-import-graphql-request-collection"
scripts.install-on-ubuntu: npm install && npm run build && mkdir -p ~/.config/Insomnia/plugins/ && cp -r ./ ~/.config/Insomnia/plugins/insomnia-plugin-import-graphql-request-collection
